languages.text: "Вот как действуют слуги закона? Такая слаженность, такое обилие алого и золотого..."
languages.translation_comment: On Rykad Minoris, after meeting the Arbitrators.

traits.locale_text: "Вот как действуют слуги закона? Такая слаженность, такое обилие алого и золотого..."

languages.text: "So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."
languages.translation_comment: On Rykad Minoris, after meeting the Arbitrators.
languages.original_text: "Вот как действуют слуги закона? Такая слаженность, такое обилие алого и золотого..."

traits.locale_text: "So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."
"So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."
"So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."
"So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."
"So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."
"So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."

languages.text: 「これが法の従者のやり方なのですね！なんという連携、なんという紅と金の豪奢さでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."

traits.locale_text: 「これが法の従者のやり方なのですね！なんという連携、なんという紅と金の豪奢さでしょう…」

languages.text: "So arbeiten die Diener des Gesetzes also! Diese Koordination, diese Fülle an Purpur und Gold ..."
languages.original_text: "So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."

traits.locale_text: "So arbeiten die Diener des Gesetzes also! Diese Koordination, diese Fülle an Purpur und Gold ..."

languages.text: « C'est donc ainsi qu'opèrent les serviteurs de la loi ! Cette coordination impressionnante, ces riches nuances de rouge et d'or... »
languages.original_text: "So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."

traits.locale_text: « C'est donc ainsi qu'opèrent les serviteurs de la loi ! Cette coordination impressionnante, ces riches nuances de rouge et d'or... »

languages.text: «¡Conque así es como operan los siervos de la ley! Qué coordinación, qué abundancia de escarlatas y dorados...».
languages.original_text: "So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Conque así es como operan los siervos de la ley! Qué coordinación, qué abundancia de escarlatas y dorados...».

languages.text: “原来律法的仆人就是这么履行职责的！如此协调，如此耀眼的红色与金色……”
languages.original_text: "So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."

traits.locale_text: “原来律法的仆人就是这么履行职责的！如此协调，如此耀眼的红色与金色……”

languages.text: "Kanunların hizmetkârları böyle iş görüyor demek! Bütün bu koordinasyon, altın ve kızıldan zenginlikler..."
languages.original_text: "So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."

traits.locale_text: "Hukukun hizmetkârları böyle iş görüyor demek! Bütün bu koordinasyon, altın ve kızıldan zenginlikler..."

languages.original_text: "So that is how servants of the law operate! Such coordination, such a wealth of scarlet and gold..."
